english.segment1: We call upon Your name, Humble ourselves and pray, Move in our hearts, Move in our land, Every national tribe and tongue Will proclaim Your Kingdom come
english.segment2: chorus: We pray, pray. Open the windows of Heaven on us. Today, we pray, Pour out Your spirit Your wonders on Earth
english.segment3: We come on bended knees. We bring an offering. Lead us in Your way,Everlasting. Every heart of every man Will pray. Your will be done
english.segment4: chorus. We pray, pray. Open the windows of Heaven on us. Today, we pray, Pour out Your spirit Your wonders on Earth
english.segment6: Pray, pray. Humble ourselves, we humble ourselves,(2x)
english.segment7: Our Father who art in Heaven. Hallowed be Your Name. Your Kingdom come. Your will be done, On earth as it is in Heaven. And lead us not into temptation, Deliver us from evil. For Thine is the Kingdom The Power and the Glory, Forever, and ever
english.segment8: chorus. We pray, pray. Open the windows of Heaven on us. Today, we pray. Pour out Your spiritYour wonders on Earth
english.segment9: We pray, pray. Open the windows of Heaven on us. Today, we pray. Pour out Your spiritYour wonders on Earth
